#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>

#define ULL unsigned long long
#define MOD 8388608 

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d%*c",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		int N;
		scanf("%d",&N);
		if(N>=23) 
		{
			printf("8388607\n"); 
			continue;
		}
		ULL sum=0,temp=1;
		for(int i=1;i<=N;i++)
		{
			sum+=temp*(i)*(i+1)/2;
			temp=(temp<<1);
			//printf("Sum before MOD %llu\n",sum);
			if(sum>=MOD) sum=sum%MOD;
			//printf("Sum after MOD %llu\n",sum);
		}
		printf("%llu\n",sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
